item.title: CVE-2024-1093|2024-03-05T01:56:03.764Z -- simon99 -- Change Memory Limit
item.description: The Change Memory Limit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the admin_logic() function hooked via admin_init in all versions up to, and including, 1.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the memory limit.
